column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Britney - Thank you for your great review. I'm glad you enjoyed our fare. And to address your concerns regarding seafood-ramen options
column2: we are a franchise concept based out of Los Angeles
column3: so every item on our menu is decided by our corporate headquarters. I can tell you that their R&D department is constantly working on new menu items
column4: so keep on the lookout for a possible seafood option down the line.
